items.name: Lulla
items.desc:
A super sessionable 3.5% pale nomadically brewed at Burning Sky using London Fog yeast, oats, wheat and tonnes of Citra and Simcoe for flavours of yellow starburst; black pepper; dandelion; salted lime; pine sap and lemon pith.
We’re offering free nationwide shipping for orders over £50 and free local deliveries for orders over £30 (both for arrival next week), plus a Click + Collect service from our brewery door this Saturday (27th; midday - 6pm) - we’d love to see you.

items.name: Parade
items.desc: The next batch of Parade will now be released week commencing 17 August. More details soon...
